00020 class ExecutionContext;
00021 class HookedMessageReferrer;
00022 class MessageHookReferrer;
00023 class MessageReferrer;
00024 
00026 class MessageHook {
00027     friend class MessageRouter;
00028     
00029     public:
00031         enum Mode {
00033             Asynchronous,   
00035             Synchronous,
00036         };
00037 
00039         MessageHook();
00041         virtual ~MessageHook();
00042 
00047         virtual BOOLEAN Attach(MsgId message_id, Mode mode = Asynchronous);
00048 
00050         virtual void Detach();
00051 
00053         MsgId GetMessageId() const { return (m_message_id); }
00054 
00059         ExecutionContext* GetExecutionContext() const { return (m_execution_context); }
00060 
00062         BOOLEAN IsAttached() const { return (m_is_attached); }
00063 
00065         BOOLEAN IsAsynchronous() const { return (m_mode == Asynchronous); }
00066 
00067     protected:
00082         virtual BOOLEAN OnMessage(Message &message) = 0;
00083 
00084     private:
00085         BOOLEAN m_marked_for_detach;
00086         BOOLEAN m_is_attached;
00087         MsgId m_message_id;
00088         Mode m_mode;
00089         INT m_refcount;
00090         ExecutionContext *m_execution_context;
00091 
00092         class Protector {
00093             public:
00094                 void Lock() { 
00095                     static BOOLEAN initialized = FALSE;
00096                     if (!initialized) {
00097                         initialized = TRUE;
00098                         m_mutex.Create(FALSE);
00099                     } // if
00100                     m_mutex.Obtain(); 
00101                 }
00102 
00103                 void Unlock() { m_mutex.Release(); }
00104 
00105             private:
00106                 Mutex m_mutex;
00107         };
00108 
00109         friend class MessageHookReferrer;
00110         // interface for MessageHookReferrer, to manipulate reference counter (method must be secured by caller)
00111         void AddRef(INT n = 1);
00112         // returns the flag, which signals, that this instance of message hook is marked for deletion from the global message hook list
00113         BOOLEAN IsMarkedForDetach() const { return (m_marked_for_detach); }
00114         // return TRUE, if there is more than one reference (one at least for the global message hook list) to this message hook
00115         BOOLEAN IsReferenced(INT ref_reference = 0) const { return (m_refcount > ref_reference); }
00116         // removes this instance from the global message hook list (method must be secured by caller)
00117         void RemoveFromGlobalList();
00118 
00119 
00120         // protector for secure list access
00121         static Protector m_protector;
00122 
00123         friend class MessageHookNotificationMsg;
00124         // suspends the distribution of the message until the hooking instances have finished their work (MessageHook::OnMessage)
00125         static BOOLEAN Suspend(const MessageReferrer &msg_ref); 
00126         /*  calls the message's hooks OnMessage, and returns TRUE, if the hooked message should be released and 
00127             dispatched to the official registered recipients. */
00128         static BOOLEAN Notify(HookedMessageReferrer *hooked_message_referrer, const MessageHookReferrer &message_hook_referrer);
00129         // resumes the message hook for the given referrer
00130         static void Resume(HookedMessageReferrer *hooked_message_referrer, const MessageHookReferrer &message_hook_referrer, BOOLEAN discard_message = FALSE); 
00131 };
